full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement:

#### Tender Title:

K8D10-230051 - Automated Titration Instrument System

#### Tender Reference Number:

WS3732326265-Doc3768787007

#### Tender Type:

Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Tender Status:

**Closed**

#### Brief Description:

The Department of Environment (ECCC) is seeking to acquire one (1) fully Automated Titration Instrument System to be delivered to the National Laboratory for Environmental Testing (NLET) in Burlington, Ontario. The system must include all instrument components, manuals, pre-installation checklists, modules, peripherals, and accessories, as well as all necessary cables and connections to operate the system as a fully automated unit.

#### Key Requirements:

* The system must be fully automated and able to operate as described in the Statement of Requirement in Annex A.
* All instrument components, manuals, and accessories must be included.
* The system must be delivered to the National Laboratory for Environmental Testing (NLET) in Burlington, Ontario.

#### Tender Period:

* Tender Closing Date: 16 December 2022 at 2 pm EST.
* All bids submitted after 2 pm EST will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information:

* Contact Name: Nathalie Longtin
* Contact Email: [nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Organization: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Online Information:

* For more information, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14765744?extsite=MTQ3NjU3NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

#### Important Note:

Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 16 December 2022 at 2 pm EST to be considered responsive.

This rewritten entry maintains the same information as the original, but rephrases it in a more professional and concise manner. The use of headings and bullet points has been added to make the text easier to read and understand.
